validate-number.message: Please enter a valid number in this field.

validate-number-range.message: The value is not within the specified range.

validate-digits.message: Please use numbers only in this field. Please avoid spaces or other characters such as dots or commas.

validate-digits-range.message: The value is not within the specified range.

validate-alpha.message: Please use letters only (a-z or A-Z) in this field.

validate-code.message: Please use only letters (a-z), numbers (0-9) or underscore(_) in this field, first character should be a letter.

validate-alphanum.message: Please use only letters (a-z or A-Z) or numbers (0-9) only in this field. No spaces or other characters are allowed.

validate-street.message: Please use only letters (a-z or A-Z) or numbers (0-9) or spaces and # only in this field.

validate-phone-strict.message: Please enter a valid phone number. For example (123) 456-7890 or 123-456-7890.

validate-phone-lax.message: Please enter a valid phone number. For example (123) 456-7890 or 123-456-7890.

validate-fax.message: Please enter a valid fax number. For example (123) 456-7890 or 123-456-7890.

validate-email.message: Please enter a valid email address. For example johndoe@domain.com.

validate-email-sender.message: Please use only visible characters and spaces.

validate-password.message: Please enter 6 or more characters. Leading or trailing spaces will be ignored.

validate-admin-password.message: Please enter 7 or more characters. Password should contain both numeric and alphabetic characters.

validate-cpassword.message: Please make sure your passwords match.

validate-url.message: Please enter a valid URL. Protocol is required (http://, https:// or ftp://)

validate-clean-url.message: Please enter a valid URL. For example http://www.example.com or www.example.com

validate-identifier.message: Please enter a valid URL Key. For example "example-page", "example-page.html" or "anotherlevel/example-page".

validate-xml-identifier.message: Please enter a valid XML-identifier. For example something_1, block5, id-4.

validate-ssn.message: Please enter a valid social security number. For example 123-45-6789.

validate-zip.message: Please enter a valid zip code. For example 90602 or 90602-1234.

validate-zip-international.message: Please enter a valid zip code.

validate-date-au.message: Please use this date format: dd/mm/yyyy. For example 17/03/2006 for the 17th of March, 2006.

validate-currency-dollar.message: Please enter a valid $ amount. For example $100.00.

validate-one-required.message: Please select one of the above options.

validate-one-required-by-name.message: Please select one of the options.

validate-not-negative-number.message: Please enter a valid number in this field.

validate-new-password.message: Please enter 6 or more characters. Leading or trailing spaces will be ignored.

validate-greater-than-zero.message: Please enter a number greater than 0 in this field.

validate-zero-or-greater.message: Please enter a number 0 or greater in this field.

validate-cc-number.message: Please enter a valid credit card number.

validate-cc-type.message: Credit card number does not match credit card type.

validate-cc-type-select.message: Card type does not match credit card number.

validate-cc-cvn.message: Please enter a valid credit card verification number.

validate-data.message: Please use only letters (a-z or A-Z), numbers (0-9) or underscore(_) in this field, first character should be a letter.

validate-css-length.message: Please input a valid CSS-length. For example 100px or 77pt or 20em or .5ex or 50%.

validate-length.message: Text length does not satisfy specified text range.

validate-percents.message: Please enter a number lower than 100.

validate-cc-ukss.message: Please enter issue number or start date for switch/solo card type.

validate-date-required.message: This date is a required value.

validate-date-full-date.message: Please enter a valid full date

validate-date-date-between.message: Please enter a valid date between %s and %s

validate-date-greater.message: Please enter a valid date equal to or greater than %s

validate-date-less.message: Please enter a valid date less than or equal to %s
